title: Augusta County: Buford C. Tynes to Achilles L. Tynes, January 26, 1948
summary: Buford C. Tynes writes his brother Achilles L. Tynes responding to his inquiries about their father's association with McCausland in the burning of Chambersburg through published articles and his father's personal letters. In return Buford tells of an incident between his uncle Charles A. Fudge and Col. Peters and asks Achilles if he knows any of the details.
keywords: Military Authority, Prisons/Prisoners, Medicine/Hospitals, American Civil War
